Title: Basil Pesto
Description: A fresh-tasting sauce made from basil leaves that goes well with pasta, bread, tomatoes, and seafood.
Directions: Bring a large pot of water to a vigorous boil, then blanche the basil leaves for thirty seconds. Immediately transfer them to a bowl of ice water.
Squeeze the basil leaves dry using paper towels, then combine all the ingredients in a food processor and blend on high speed until desired consistency is reached.
